      • getListWithPosition

        public int getListWithPosition(java.util.List<java.lang.String> outputList,
                      int position)
        Returns a single list containing all media, along with the position of the first media in 'position' in the _new_ single list.
        Parameters:
        outputList - The list to be written to.
        position - Position to retrieve in to _this_ adapter.
        Returns:
        The position of 'position' in the new single list, or 0 if not found.
